title: The Widowmaker (2015)

cast.name: Melinda Murray
cast.character: Herself - Lost Husband to Heart Attack

cast.name: Julio Palmaz
cast.character: Himself - Texas Health Science Center, San Antonio       (as Dr. Julio Palmaz)

cast.name: Martin B. Leon
cast.character: Himself - Columbia University Medical Center, NYC       (as Prof. Martin B. Leon)

cast.name: Bruce H. Brundage
cast.character: Himself - Former Professor, David Geffen School of Medicine

cast.name: Douglas P. Boyd
cast.character: Himself - Former Professor of Radiology, UCSF

cast.name: Harvey S. Hecht
cast.character: Himself - Professor, Mount Sinai Medical Center

cast.name: Matthew Budoff
cast.character: Himself - Los Angeles Biomedical Research Institute

cast.name: Eva Cohen Weingarten
cast.character: Herself - Wife of Heart Attack Victim

overview: Every minute of every year an American drops dead of a heart attack, hundreds of thousands without any warning or prior symptom. But these people could have been saved. The Widowmaker uncovers a chilling tale of greed, ego, and a conspiracy of silence around that most vulnerable of human organs - the heart.
storyline: Every minute of every year an American drops dead of a heart attack, hundreds of thousands without any warning or prior symptom. But these people could have been saved. The Widowmaker uncovers a chilling tale of greed, ego, and a conspiracy of silence around that most vulnerable of human organs - the heart.
